content: keep cozy while looking stylish in this crochet hat perfect for a winter hike or a relaxing evening by the campfire stitched in red heart super easy you ll practice essential techniques like making a pompom single_crochet working in back loop chain stitch and more this toasty hat comes in one size that fits most so pick your favorite colors and create a gift everyone loves materials red heart® super easy™ 8 8 oz/250 g 238 yds/218 m sizes small large hat contrast a aran 0005 2 2 balls pompom contrast b moss 0007 1 ball or 45 yds/41 m sizes to fit adult head sizes small large finished circumference 20 21-22 51 53 5-56 cm
